name: Keeper of the Green
description:
You are the Keeper of the Green Tower.  It's your shift and during your shift, it's your responsibility to repair any of the green energy extraction machines that break.  Energy is lost when the machines are malfunctioning, and you lose the game if the power reaches 0.  

Created for Godot Wild Jam #38

Credits:  Coding by Valentino Collazo and David Conner - Source code will be available under the Apache-2.0 license.

All music and artwork created by Valentino Collazo, expept for the pixel art forest background, which was created by Eder Muniz (Itch.io: https://edermunizz.itch.io/).

All the assets are licensed by the CC-BY-SA-4.0 license
